Essential elements of storytelling, Bridge the "imagination gap", and more.

Issue #112 // Aug 1, 2014

#nptech weekly A free, once-weekly email roundup of the latest news in nonprofit technology.

reading

essential elements of storytelling/a>

Four main aspects of social-change storytelling, and what organizations of any size can do to work on them.

philanthropy.com

Understanding the Nonprofit “Imagination Gap”

Organizations that focus too much on the details — how many followers they have, whether they hit their fundraising goals last quarter — often find themselves struggling to fulfill their mission.

cds-global.com

The Art of Less As More: Micro Content

Be pithy, but don't be shallow.

bethkanter.org

Charities Like Facebook for Rallying Support but Not Much for Fundraising

Only 2 percent of nonprofits in the United States raised $10,000 to $25,000 through Facebook in a 12-month period, and 1 percent raised $25,000 to $100,000,

philanthropy.com
